title: The Four Lords of the Diamond
description: Omnibus edition of the four novels in the "Four Lords of the Diamond" series by Jack L. Chalker.p. 1 - A Snake in the Grass (1981)p. 175 - A Wolf in the Fold (1982)p. 351 - A Dragon at the Gate (1982)p. 539 - A Tiger by the Tail (1983)Cover art by Richard Powers.
author: Jack L. Chalker
